description: Detects VBScript content stored into registry keys as seen being used by UNC2452 group
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
name: VBScript Payload Stored in Registry
query: ((winlog.event_data.TargetObject:/.*[Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt][Ww][Aa][Rr][Ee]\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Cc][Uu][Rr][Rr][Ee][Nn][Tt][Vv][Ee][Rr][Ss][Ii][Oo][Nn].*/ AND winlog.event_data.Details:(/.*[Vv][Bb][Ss][Cc][Rr][Ii][Pp][Tt]\:.*/ OR /.*[Jj][Ss][Cc][Rr][Ii][Pp][Tt]\:.*/ OR /.*[Mm][Ss][Hh][Tt][Mm][Ll]\,.*/ OR *RunHTMLApplication* OR /.*[Ee][Xx][Ee][Cc][Uu][Tt][Ee]\(.*/ OR *CreateObject* OR /.*[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww]\.[Cc][Ll][Oo][Ss][Ee].*/)) AND (NOT ((winlog.event_data.TargetObject:/.*[Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt][Ww][Aa][Rr][Ee]\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Cc][Uu][Rr][Rr][Ee][Nn][Tt][Vv][Ee][Rr][Ss][Ii][Oo][Nn]\\[Rr][Uu][Nn].*/) OR ((process.executable:/.*\\[Mm][Ss][Ii][Ee][Xx][Ee][Cc]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:/.*\\[Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt][Ww][Aa][Rr][Ee]\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Cc][Uu][Rr][Rr][Ee][Nn][Tt][Vv][Ee][Rr][Ss][Ii][Oo][Nn]\\[Ii][Nn][Ss][Tt][Aa][Ll][Ll][Ee][Rr]\\[Uu][Ss][Ee][Rr][Dd][Aa][Tt][Aa]\\.*/ AND winlog.event_data.Details:(/.*\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\.[Nn][Ee][Tt]\\[Pp][Rr][Ii][Mm][Aa][Rr][Yy]\ [Ii][Nn][Tt][Ee][Rr][Oo][Pp]\ [Aa][Ss][Ss][Ee][Mm][Bb][Ll][Ii][Ee][Ss]\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\.[Mm][Ss][Hh][Tt][Mm][Ll]\.[Dd][Ll][Ll].*/ OR /.*\<\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\.[Mm][Ss][Hh][Tt][Mm][Ll]\,[Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Vv][Ee][Rr][Ss][Ii][Oo][Nn]\=.*/ OR /.*\_[Mm][Ss][Hh][Tt][Mm][Ll]\_[Dd][Ll][Ll]\_.*/ OR /.*\<\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\.[Mm][Ss][Hh][Tt][Mm][Ll]\,[Cc][Uu][Ll][Tt][Uu][Rr][Ee]\=.*/))))))
